segments.text: The water is just pouring everywhere, and no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in a puddle like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined, and she’s just drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are making a mess too, climbing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a slippery disaster soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should turn off the faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how irresponsible this is.
segments.speaker: PAR
